title: Introducing SAM, the ultimate sales AI sidekick | Similarweb
description: Similarweb‚Äôs Sales AI Module (SAM) is the AI-powered sales assistant that crafts your perfect outbound messaging and helps close more deals. Click to read now.
content: HomeBlogUpdatesProduct UpdatesSimilarweb Sales AI Module (SAM): The AI Assistant That Helps You Close More Deals Updates Similarweb Sales AI Module (SAM): The AI Assistant That Helps You Close More Deals Get early access by Jonathan Stefansky , VP, Sales Intelligence 5 Min. April 18, 2024 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic We love Alexa, we know Siri, but now it‚Äôs time to meet SAM. Unlike every other co-pilot on the market, SAM uses Similarweb‚Äôs unique Digital Data combined with a touch of AI magic to craft account-tailored outbound messages that resonate with your prospects. This unrivaled combo gives you insight into how your target accounts perform, turning every sales rep into an expert. It‚Äôs the ultimate AI sidekick for every sales team. Working with SAM will be like working with the most insightful and knowledgeable researcher who prepares you with a detailed analysis before every meeting, an outbound messaging expert who knows exactly what you should say to grab the attention of your prospect, and an assistant who keeps an eye on every detail in your accounts so you can consistently provide value to your customers. Here‚Äôs some of the immediate results you‚Äôll see with SAM: Increased responses to SDRs‚Äô outbound messaging Reps who are prepared with prospect-tailored solutions for every meeting Insights to build trust and add value to customers In short, SAM positions your business as the right solution for your target accounts and turns leads into clients. The value SAM brings to Sales teams everywhere SAM differs from every other sales assistant in one very critical aspect: data. SAM interprets our Digital Data into relevant and reliable prospect-tailored insights that enable Sales teams to understand their prospects in real-time. Here‚Äôs what else you‚Äôll only get with SAM: 1. SAM crafts the perfect outbound messaging Your sales team‚Äôs overall success relies on communicating the why and how your offering will help their business grow. With SAM, you get hyper-personalized, ready-to-use outbound messaging that spotlights your company as the right solution for your prospect. This isn‚Äôt just your regular, run-of-the-mill AI-generated copy; these are data-driven talking points tailored to each account. In addition, SAM can customize the tone and length of your message per account, so you can use it for LinkedIn messages, call scripts, and more. 2. SAM does account research in seconds You‚Äôre also going to need to research each account. With SAM, you‚Äôll get instant company overviews and insights through Google Calendar, LinkedIn, and company websites. You and your sales reps will be ready for any meeting, call, or opportune encounter with the prospect. Thanks to SAM, your team members will always be prepared, even if they haven‚Äôt prepared themselves. The natural byproduct of this insight-driven research is improved efficiency and productivity for the entire sales team. SDRs and AEs are now free to focus on relationship building, finding new leads, and closing deals. Win-win. 3. SAM never misses an opportunity Identifying opportunities and risks for all your accounts has never been easier ‚Äì or more accurate. Only with SAM do you get prospect-tailored insights based on buyer intent, sales signals, and your prospects‚Äô unique use case. We‚Äôre talking personalized insights on millions of accounts so you better understand your prospects‚Äô needs and how to accurately position yourself per account. SAM pulls insights from the metrics that matter to your prospect in real-time so that you can take timely action, resulting in revenue growth. 4. SAM plays well with others We‚Äôre not looking to complicate things for you or your team. With SAM, sales is easier. Even integrating SAM into your existing workflow is easy. Soon, SAM will automatically integrate with Salesforce, Salesloft, Outreach, HubSpot, and Gmail. Currently in the Beta stage, it integrates will LinkedIn, Sales Navigator, and Google Calendar. Your team‚Äôs workflow isn‚Äôt impacted, only enhanced. Like the good quota-crushing sidekick it is, SAM shows up where your team is already working as an easy-to-click Similarweb logo. No separate dashboard, no new tab, and no getting used to a new platform. SAM hits the ground running on day one with insights always at your fingertips. Access SAM without even opening a new tab I can‚Äôt stress enough how easy it is to integrate SAM into existing workflows. For clients and free trial users, you‚Äôll simply download the Similarweb Sales Intelligence Chrome extension, and that‚Äôs it. You‚Äôre done. SAM is now working alongside you to deliver insights via: Your prospects‚Äô LinkedIn pages and profiles Your prospects‚Äô company website Your Gmail and Google Calendar Want to join SAM‚Äôs closed Beta? Starting today, the SAM beta is open to everyone, not just current Similarweb customers. If you‚Äôre not yet a Similarweb customer, complete this form to join the waitlist. Once approved, you will be notified via email. You can position your company as the clear solution, you can crush the competition, you can convert your leads into clients, you can be the one hitting the gong, and you can do it well in 2024 (and beyond) ‚Äî if you do it with SAM. Close more deals, more often. Meet SAM. Click to request early access ‚§µ Get early access FAQs What is this AI based on? With Similarweb‚Äôs unique Digital Data combined with the power of generative AI, SAM generates real-time insights based on knowledge and data no one else has. When is SAM available to work with? Starting 1 May 2024, the SAM beta is open to everyone, not just current Similarweb customers. If you‚Äôre a Similarweb customer, download our free Chrome extension to start using SAM. If you‚Äôre not yet a Similarweb customer, complete this form to join the waitlist. Once approved, you will be notified via email. What are SAM‚Äôs availabilities? Explore SAM‚Äôs ‚Äúportfolio‚Äù to learn all its qualifications and capabilities. Is SAM free? During the beta, those who have been permitted to join will have free access. SAM‚Äôs cost will be built-in to our SI packages with the full launch. How does SAM work its magic? A magician never tells üòâ by Jonathan Stefansky VP, Sales Intelligence Jonathan has led teams at Goldman Sachs and Akamai, co-founded Viewbix (acquired), and grew Jeeng's revenue by 600% before its $100M acquisition.
